channel.title: Posts on Thomas Ruiz Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Thomas Ruiz Blog

item.title: Going Live
item.description: Here we go! It’s about time I finally start blogging. I always wanted to write about my work and shamelessly rant about things I hate. Because, let’s be honest, there’s a lot to hate in our field. Anyway, here I am, after a few years of thinking about it, deploying my first CMS to github pages. Let’s see why and how I did that. Choices are hard I’ve already written a few articles on the web.
